queenAnne.name: Queen Anne
queenAnne.description: Nestled in the heart of Lower Queen Anne, our original location offers a warm, home-like setting with easy access for families commuting through downtown Seattle.
highlights: Cozy, renovated Victorian building with natural light
Private outdoor play yard with garden beds

capitolHill.name: Capitol Hill
capitolHill.description: Located in a vibrant Capitol Hill neighborhood, our second campus brings the same nurturing philosophy to families on the east side of the city.
highlights: Large outdoor playground with climbing structures
Dedicated art studio and sensory room

infants.name: Infants
infants.shortDescription: A nurturing, responsive environment for your baby's crucial first year.

toddlers.name: Toddlers
toddlers.shortDescription: Exploration and discovery as your toddler develops independence and social skills.

preschool.name: Preschool
preschool.shortDescription: Preparing for kindergarten through play-based, project-driven learning.

testimonials.quote: Beginnings became our second family. The teachers truly know and love our daughter, and we've seen her blossom into a confident, curious learner.
testimonials.author: Sarah M.

testimonials.quote: As first-time parents, leaving our infant was terrifying. The staff's warmth and constant communication made all the difference. We actually look forward to drop-off.
testimonials.author: Marcus & Elena T.

testimonials.quote: The Reggio-inspired approach here isn't just marketing—you see it in the art, the projects, the way teachers follow children's interests. Our son has thrived.
testimonials.author: David K.

testimonials.quote: Both of our kids went through Beginnings, and we couldn't imagine our Seattle parenting journey without this community. Worth every moment on the waitlist.
testimonials.author: Jennifer L.
testimonials.details: Parent of graduates now in elementary school, Capitol Hill

seo.defaultTitle: Beginnings Schools | Nonprofit Daycare & Preschool in Seattle
seo.defaultDescription: NAEYC-accredited, play-based early learning for infants, toddlers, and preschoolers in Queen Anne and Capitol Hill, Seattle. Organic meals, inclusive community.
